verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus is my Saviour,
I shall not be moved;
In His love and favour,
I shall not be moved;
Just like a tree that's planted
by the waters,
I shall not be moved.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
I shall not be,
I shall not be moved,
I shall not be,
I shall not be moved;
Just like a tree that's planted
by the waters,
I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In my Christ abiding,
I shall not be moved;
In His love I'm hiding,
I shall not be moved;
Just like a tree that's planted
by the waters,
I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
If I trust Him ever,
I shall not be moved:
He will fail me never,
I shall not be moved;
Just like a tree that's planted
by the waters,
I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
On His word I'm feeding,
I shall not be moved,
He's the One that's leading,
I shall not be moved,
Just like a tree that's planted
by the waters,
I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Glory hallelujah,
I shall not be moved;
Anchored in Jehovah,
I shall not be moved;
Just like a tree that's planted by
the waters,
I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
In His love abiding,
I shall not be moved;
And in Him confiding,
I shall not be moved:
Just like a tree that's planted
by the waters,
I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Though all hell assail me,
I shall not be moved;
Jesus will not fail me,
I shall not be moved;
Just like a tree that's planted
by the waters,
I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Though the tempest rages,
I shall not be moved,
On the Rock of Ages,
I shall not be moved;
Just like a tree that's planted
by the waters,
I shall not be moved.
